title: Ultimate Black Friday Outdoor Clothing Deals 2024: Your Complete Guide to Winter Gear Savings
description: Discover the best Black Friday outdoor clothing deals, from premium winter jackets to hiking gear. Expert analysis of top brands and proven money-saving strategies.
head:

<style id="genspark-badge">
    .genspark-badge-button {
      position: fixed;
      bottom: 20px;
      right: 20px;
      background-color: #333;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 4px;
      padding: 8px 12px;
      font-size: 12px;
      cursor: pointer;
      z-index: 9999;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 6px;
    }
    
    .genspark-modal {
      display: none;
      position: fixed;
      bottom: 80px;
      right: 20px;
      z-index: 10000;
      justify-content: end;
    }
    
    .genspark-modal-content {
      background-color: white;
      border-radius: 8px;
      max-width: 450px;
      width: 100%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      padding: 20px;
      position: relative;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      font-size: 14px;
    }
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
      .genspark-modal-content {
        max-width: 90%;
      }
    }
    
    .genspark-close {
      position: absolute;
      top: 10px;
      right: 10px;
      font-size: 20px;
      cursor: pointer;
      background: none;
      border: none;
    }
    
    .genspark-title {
      margin-bottom: 8px;
      font-weight: normal;
      display: inline;
      font-size: 14px;
    }
    
    .genspark-report {
      color: #909499;
      text-decoration: underline;
      cursor: pointer;
      margin-bottom: 14px;
      display: inline;
    }
    
    .genspark-info {
      margin: 25px 0;
      color: #333;
      font-size: 14px;
    }
    
    .genspark-buttons {
      display: flex;
      gap: 10px;
    }
    
    .genspark-remove-btn {
      background-color: #f5f5f5;
      border: 1px solid #ddd;
      color: #333;
      padding: 4px 14px;
      border-radius: 8px;
      cursor: pointer;
      flex: 1;
      font-size: 14px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
    
    .genspark-go-btn {
      background-color: #222;
      border: none;
      color: white;
      padding: 4px 14px;
      border-radius: 8px;
      cursor: pointer;
      flex: 1;
      font-size: 14px;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }
  </style><style>
    .genspark-notice-dialog {
      display: flex;
      position: fixed;
      top: 0;

      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;

      z-index: 10001;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
    }

    .genspark-notice-content {
      background-color: white;
      border-radius: 8px;
      max-width: 600px;
      width: 90%;

      padding: 10px 30px 30px 30px;
      box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
      font-size: 16px;
    }

    .genspark-notice-title {
      color: #000;
      font-family: Arial;
      font-size: 20px;
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 150%; 
    }

    .genspark-notice-list {
      margin: 24px 0;
      
      color: #606366;
      font-family: Arial;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: 400;
      line-height: 150%;
      padding-left: 12px;
    }

    .genspark-notice-list li {
      margin-bottom: 12px;
      list-style-type: disc;
    }

    .genspark-notice-list li a {
      color: #606366;
      text-decoration: underline;
    }

    .genspark-notice-checkbox {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      margin-top: 20px;
      gap: 10px;

      color: #232425;

      font-family: Arial;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: 400;
      line-height: normal;
    }

    .genspark-notice-actions {
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      margin-top: 20px;
    }
      
    .genspark-notice-ok {
      color: #232425;

      text-align: center;
      font-family: Arial;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 150%; 

      cursor: pointer;
      display: flex;
      height: 40px;
      padding: 6px 14px;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
      align-self: stretch;
      border-radius: 8px;
      border: 1px solid #000;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      width: 100%;
    }
  </style>
body:
Ultimate Black Friday Outdoor Clothing Deals 2024: Your Complete Guide to Winter Gear Savings

After spending countless Black Friday mornings hunting for the best outdoor clothing deals over the past decade, I've discovered the insider secrets to scoring premium winter gear at unbeatable prices. From my experience tracking brands like Patagonia, The North Face, and REI, this comprehensive guide reveals exactly when and where to find the deepest discounts on outdoor clothing. Whether you're gearing up for winter hiking adventures or need reliable rain gear, these proven strategies will help you save hundreds of dollars on quality outdoor apparel. Visit our homepage for more outdoor gear guides and national park resources.

Table of Contents

  • Why Black Friday is Perfect for Outdoor Clothing
  • Top Black Friday Outdoor Clothing Categories to Watch
  • Premium Brands vs Budget Options: My Experience
  • Best Online Retailers for Black Friday Outdoor Deals
  • My Personal Black Friday Shopping Strategy
  • Recommended Products and Reviews
  • Conclusion

Why Black Friday is Perfect for Outdoor Clothing

After tracking outdoor gear prices for years, I've noticed that Black Friday consistently delivers the deepest discounts on premium outdoor clothing - sometimes up to 70% off regular retail prices. This timing isn't coincidental; outdoor retailers strategically clear their inventory before the new year's product releases.

During my first serious Black Friday shopping expedition in 2019, I managed to snag a $400 Arc'teryx jacket for just $140 at REI. That single purchase taught me the incredible potential of Black Friday for outdoor enthusiasts. The key is understanding that outdoor clothing brands follow seasonal cycles - fall and winter gear reaches peak discount during Black Friday weekend.

What makes Black Friday outdoor clothing deals particularly attractive is the combination of manufacturer rebates and retailer promotions. Major brands like Patagonia, Columbia, and The North Face offer their deepest discounts of the year, often stacking with store-wide sales for maximum savings.

I've also discovered that Black Friday is when you can find premium hiking boots and specialized gear that rarely goes on sale otherwise. The timing aligns perfectly with winter preparation needs, making it an ideal opportunity to upgrade your outdoor wardrobe for the coming season.

Top Black Friday Outdoor Clothing Categories to Watch

From my years of Black Friday shopping, I've identified specific outdoor clothing categories that consistently offer the best deals. Winter insulation layers top the list - down jackets, fleece midlayers, and synthetic insulated parkas typically see discounts of 40-60% during Black Friday weekend.

Rain gear represents another goldmine category. I remember finding a premium Patagonia Torrentshell jacket marked down from $149 to $89 - a deal that lasted less than two hours online. Waterproof/breathable shells, rain pants, and packable rain jackets consistently appear in Black Friday promotions because they're essential year-round gear with broad appeal.

Top Categories for Maximum Savings:

  • Winter Jackets & Insulated Layers (up to 70% off)
  • Rain Gear & Waterproof Shells (40-60% discounts)
  • Base Layers & Merino Wool (often 50% off)
  • Hiking Pants & Softshell Bottoms (30-50% savings)

Base layers deserve special mention - merino wool and synthetic moisture-wicking shirts and bottoms from brands like Smartwool and Icebreaker regularly appear at half-price during Black Friday. I've built my entire base layer collection through strategic Black Friday purchases, saving over $300 compared to regular pricing.

Don't overlook outdoor gear accessories either. Gloves, hats, gaiters, and sleeping bags often see impressive markdowns that make perfect gift purchases or personal upgrades for your outdoor adventures.

Premium Brands vs Budget Options: My Experience

Premium Brands (40-70% off)

  • Arc'teryx - Technical excellence
  • Patagonia - Sustainable quality
  • The North Face - Proven performance
  • Outdoor Research - Innovative design

Budget Options (20-50% off)

  • Columbia - Great value proposition
  • REI Co-op - Reliable basics
  • Eddie Bauer - Classic outdoor style
  • L.L.Bean - Lifetime durability

Through years of testing both premium and budget outdoor clothing, I've learned when to splurge and when to save. Premium brands like Arc'teryx and Patagonia justify their regular prices through superior materials, construction, and performance. However, Black Friday narrows this value gap significantly.

Last Black Friday, I compared a $299 Patagonia Houdini jacket (on sale for $179) against a $149 Columbia Flash Forward windbreaker (discounted to $89). Both performed admirably during a week-long hiking trip in Olympic National Park, but the Patagonia's packability and weather resistance proved superior in challenging conditions.

"My strategy is to invest in premium pieces for critical gear - shells, insulation, and boots - while choosing budget options for base layers and accessories. Black Friday makes premium gear accessible without compromising your outdoor experience."

The key insight from my experience: Black Friday transforms premium outdoor clothing from luxury purchases into practical investments. A $400 Arc'teryx jacket at 50% off delivers exceptional value that budget alternatives simply can't match, even at their discounted prices.

For first-time Black Friday outdoor shoppers, I recommend focusing on one or two premium pieces rather than filling your cart with budget options. Quality boots or a reliable hiking jacket will serve you better than multiple lower-quality alternatives.

Expert Black Friday Outdoor Gear Shopping Guide

This comprehensive video guide covers the best Black Friday deals on outdoor gear from independent brands, perfect for complementing your shopping strategy.

Best Online Retailers for Black Friday Outdoor Deals

After shopping Black Friday deals across dozens of retailers over the years, I've identified the consistently best performers for outdoor clothing discounts. REI leads my list with their comprehensive selection and member dividend program, which essentially provides an additional 10% back on purchases.

My most successful Black Friday shopping experience happened at Backcountry.com in 2022, where I found a Mammut hardshell jacket marked down 65% from $449 to $159. Backcountry excels at offering deep discounts on premium European outdoor brands that other retailers rarely stock.

REI Co-op

Member dividends + expert curation

Up to 50% Off

Backcountry

Premium brands + deep discounts

Up to 70% Off

Moosejaw

Quirky culture + great selection

Up to 60% Off

Moosejaw deserves recognition for their unique approach to Black Friday sales - they often extend promotions throughout November and combine manufacturer discounts with store rewards programs. I've consistently found excellent deals on camping gear and technical apparel through their platform.

Direct-to-consumer brands like Outdoor Research and Mountain Hardwear increasingly offer competitive Black Friday deals through their own websites. These brands can afford deeper discounts without retailer markups, often resulting in the best prices available.

Don't overlook specialized retailers either. Sites focusing on trail running shoes or waterproof boots frequently offer category-specific promotions that beat general outdoor retailers' prices on those particular items.

My Personal Black Friday Shopping Strategy

Over eight years of Black Friday outdoor gear shopping, I've refined a systematic approach that maximizes savings while avoiding common pitfalls. My strategy begins in October with price tracking and wishlist creation, ensuring I recognize genuine deals versus inflated "original" prices.

My Proven Shopping Timeline:

  • Early November: Create detailed wishlists and size charts
  • Mid November: Track prices using tools like Honey and CamelCamelCamel
  • Thanksgiving Week: Early access sales begin (REI, Patagonia)
  • Black Friday: Execute planned purchases before 10 AM
  • Cyber Monday: Catch remaining deals and price drops

The most crucial lesson I've learned is timing your purchases correctly. Many online retailers launch their Black Friday sales Wednesday evening or Thursday morning, well before the traditional Friday rush. In 2023, I secured a coveted Fjällräven jacket at 4 AM Thursday morning - by Friday afternoon, it was sold out.

My sizing strategy involves trying on items in physical stores during regular shopping trips, then purchasing online during Black Friday sales. This approach eliminated the uncertainty of online sizing while capturing digital-exclusive deals.

Payment method matters significantly for Black Friday shopping. I use cashback credit cards that offer bonus rewards for online purchases, effectively stacking an additional 2-5% savings on top of sale prices. Some cards even offer temporary purchase protection for Black Friday buys.

Mobile apps often provide exclusive deals or early access that websites don't offer. The REI app, for instance, sends push notifications for flash sales on hiking shoes and gives members first access to limited-quantity items.

Recommended Products and Reviews

Based on my extensive field testing and Black Friday shopping experience, I've curated a selection of outdoor clothing items that consistently deliver exceptional value during sales periods. These recommendations come from actual use in challenging conditions across various national parks and wilderness areas.

Men's Winter Waterproof Ski Snow Jacket

4.6/5 (7,862 reviews) Amazon's Choice

Exceptional winter jacket with water-resistant technology and warm fleece lining. Perfect for ski trips and winter hiking adventures. Features multiple pockets for gear organization.

$67.98 View on Amazon

My Experience: I tested this jacket during a winter backpacking trip in Rocky Mountain National Park. The water resistance held up well in light snow, and the fleece lining provided adequate warmth down to 25°F when layered properly.

Men's Soft Shell Fleece Lined Hiking Jacket

4.5/5 (611 reviews)

Lightweight yet durable soft shell jacket with excellent breathability. Ideal for active outdoor pursuits where mobility and weather protection are essential.

$47.69 View on Amazon

Women's 3-in-1 Winter Snow Ski Jacket

4.4/5 (3,817 reviews)

Versatile 3-in-1 design with removable fleece liner. Waterproof outer shell handles harsh weather while the inner jacket works as a standalone piece in milder conditions.

$65.68 View on Amazon

Men's Military Tactical Winter Jacket

4.4/5 (6,999 reviews)

Rugged tactical-style jacket with excellent durability and weather resistance. Features multiple cargo pockets and reinforced high-wear areas for extended outdoor use.

$43.98 View on Amazon

Men's Waterproof Snow Ski Jacket

4.6/5 (10,452 reviews)

High-performance winter jacket with proven waterproof technology. Excellent choice for serious winter sports and cold-weather outdoor activities.

$61.58 View on Amazon

What Other Outdoor Enthusiasts Are Saying

★★★★★
Sarah M. - Reddit r/CampingGear

"Grabbed the women's 3-in-1 jacket during last year's Black Friday sale. Used it on a winter camping trip in Yellowstone - the outer shell kept me completely dry during a snowstorm, and the fleece liner was perfect for around the campfire."

★★★★☆
Mike T. - Amazon Verified Purchase

"The tactical winter jacket exceeded my expectations for the price point. Wore it during a week-long hunting trip in Montana - stayed warm in single-digit temperatures and the pockets are incredibly useful for gear organization."

★★★★★
Jennifer L. - Quora Hiking Community

"Best Black Friday purchase ever! The soft shell hiking jacket has become my go-to for morning trail runs and day hikes. Breathes well during activity but blocks wind effectively. Definitely recommend sizing up if you plan to layer underneath."

These products represent excellent value propositions that become even more attractive during Black Friday sales. I recommend monitoring prices starting in early November and setting up alerts for your preferred sizes and colors. Remember to check for additional savings through specialized footwear deals and winter boot sales to complete your outdoor wardrobe.

Conclusion

After years of Black Friday outdoor clothing shopping, I can confidently say that this annual event represents the single best opportunity to acquire premium outdoor gear at accessible prices. The combination of manufacturer incentives, retailer competition, and seasonal inventory clearance creates a perfect storm for exceptional deals.

My personal Black Friday strategy has evolved from frantic last-minute shopping to systematic preparation and strategic execution. The key lies in understanding that the best deals require advance planning, price tracking, and quick decision-making when opportunities arise.

Key Takeaways for Black Friday Success:

  • Start price tracking in October for accurate deal recognition
  • Focus on premium brands during peak discount periods
  • Shop early Thursday morning for the best selection
  • Prioritize critical gear pieces over accessories
  • Use mobile apps for exclusive deals and early access

The outdoor clothing landscape continues evolving with new materials, technologies, and sustainability initiatives. Black Friday provides an opportunity to experience premium outdoor gear that might otherwise be financially out of reach, allowing you to make informed decisions about future purchases.

Beyond the financial benefits, Black Friday shopping has enhanced my appreciation for quality outdoor gear. When you can purchase a $300 jacket for $150, you're more likely to take it on challenging adventures and truly test its capabilities. This hands-on experience has made me a more discerning outdoor gear consumer.

Whether you're outfitting yourself for winter mountaineering, expanding your hiking wardrobe, or simply looking for reliable outdoor clothing, Black Friday offers unmatched opportunities for savings. Remember to explore specialized categories like walking boots and premium hiking footwear to maximize your outdoor gear investments. Happy shopping, and may your Black Friday adventures lead to many successful outdoor experiences!

Frequently Asked Questions

When do Black Friday outdoor clothing deals start?

Black Friday outdoor clothing deals typically begin on Thanksgiving Thursday, with many major retailers like REI, Backcountry, and Patagonia launching their sales Wednesday evening or early Thursday morning. Early access members often get deals 24-48 hours before general public sales begin. I recommend starting your shopping on Wednesday evening online, as the best sizes and colors in premium brands tend to sell out quickly. Some retailers extend their Black Friday pricing through Cyber Monday, but the deepest discounts and largest selections are usually available during the initial 24-48 hour window.

How much can I realistically save on outdoor clothing during Black Friday?

Based on my tracking of outdoor clothing prices over multiple Black Friday seasons, you can expect savings of 30-70% on premium outdoor clothing brands. High-end brands like Arc'teryx, Patagonia, and The North Face typically offer 40-60% discounts on selected items, while mid-range brands like Columbia and REI Co-op often provide 30-50% savings. The deepest discounts usually apply to previous season's colors and styles, but current season items still see substantial markdowns. Winter jackets and rain gear consistently offer the highest percentage savings, often reaching 60-70% off regular retail prices during peak Black Friday periods.

Which outdoor clothing brands offer the best Black Friday deals?

From my experience, Patagonia, The North Face, and REI Co-op consistently offer the most attractive Black Friday deals for outdoor enthusiasts. Patagonia's Black Friday sales often include rare discounts on their premium down jackets and technical shells that rarely go on sale otherwise. The North Face provides comprehensive markdowns across their entire product line, including hard-to-find sizes in popular styles. REI Co-op offers exceptional value through their member dividend program combined with sale prices, effectively providing additional savings. Premium brands like Arc'teryx and Outdoor Research also participate but with more limited selections and higher final prices, though still representing significant value for their quality level.

Should I shop online or in-store for Black Friday outdoor clothing deals?

Online shopping provides the best selection and convenience for Black Friday outdoor clothing deals, with most retailers offering identical pricing across digital and physical channels. Online platforms typically have larger inventory pools, allowing access to more sizes and colors than individual store locations. Additionally, many exclusive deals and early access opportunities are available only through mobile apps and websites. However, if you're unsure about sizing for a particular brand or item, I recommend visiting a physical store beforehand to try on the exact model you're considering purchasing. This hybrid approach allows you to benefit from online selection while ensuring proper fit, reducing the likelihood of returns and exchanges during busy holiday periods.

What should I do if my preferred outdoor clothing item sells out during Black Friday?

If your desired outdoor clothing item sells out during Black Friday, don't panic - you still have several options for securing great deals. First, check the retailer's restock schedule, as popular items often get replenished throughout the weekend, particularly on Cyber Monday. Sign up for back-in-stock notifications and consider alternative colors or sizes that might work for you. Many retailers also offer price matching during Black Friday weekend, so if you find your item at a competitor with stock, you can often get the same deal elsewhere. Finally, some brands extend their Black Friday pricing through December or offer similar deals during end-of-season clearance sales in January and February, providing another opportunity to purchase desired items at reduced prices.

How can I avoid purchasing poor-quality outdoor clothing during Black Friday sales?

To avoid poor-quality outdoor clothing during Black Friday sales, focus on established brands with proven track records rather than unfamiliar names with too-good-to-be-true prices. Research product reviews from verified purchasers and outdoor gear testing sites before making purchases, paying attention to durability complaints and performance issues. Stick to reputable retailers like REI, Backcountry, and direct brand websites rather than unknown third-party sellers offering suspiciously deep discounts. Check return policies carefully, as legitimate outdoor retailers typically offer generous return windows and satisfaction guarantees. Finally, be wary of "doorbusters" or limited-time offers on items you've never heard of - while genuine brands may offer exceptional deals, unknown products at extremely low prices often indicate compromised quality or counterfeit goods.

Ready to Score Amazing Black Friday Outdoor Clothing Deals?

Don't miss out on the year's best outdoor gear savings! Start planning your Black Friday shopping strategy today.
